website_summaries.verdict: The soap is designed for post-workout use, but it's great for anyone looking for soft skin.
pros: lemon essential oil to reduce oily skin
and patchouli to encourage blood flow
The scent is mild and the company offers a money back guarantee
cons: The bar itself doesn't last very long

customer_reviews.title: Great soap, this is all I use now
customer_reviews.text: Great soap, this is all I use now. Will probably never buy body wash at the store again. Only con to this product is that it seems to go pretty quick for the price. I started using this soap in January and have already gone through 3 bars. I think they should be priced lower because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Cleanses well but not worth the $$.
customer_reviews.text: Great smell and removes deodorant residue from underarms with little effort. Unfortunately the price is higher than my favorite designer soap and lasts 1/2 as long. There is nothing spectacular about the soap that merits the high price point.
customer_reviews.author: PennyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great bar of soap.  But it could be a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bar of soap. The peppermint oil and scent lasts for the entire use of the bar, and it isn't overpowering. The soap does what it's supposed to do: cleans. Overall a fine product. My one gripe: It's to small. the bar is marketed to athletes, which would benefit from this specific soap. BUT, they need to double the size. You just go through the bar so fast. I'd pay more for a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: James Sparks

customer_reviews.title: For active lifestyles.
customer_reviews.text: Quality soap that helps active lifestyles. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Lang

customer_reviews.title: All-time favorite soap
customer_reviews.text: I laughed at the funny answers about the consequences of an unathletic person using the soap. I can attest I am still alive. I love this soap. I had forgotten I paid $9+. I have to admit it is my all-time favorite soap. I buy here and there trying to find a basic healthy soap with exfoliating properties and a smell I love and even though it is high priced I know it's healthy. How much is that worth?
customer_reviews.author: Donna and Eno Compton

customer_reviews.title: So Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: This makes for an awesome shower after a hot summer run! It smells great and is just incredibly refreshing. I find it be most effective if I use the bar right on my skin (instead of a washcloth or loofa). The bar itself doesn't last very long, but I found that putting it on a soap saver (instead of right on the soap dish) helps.
customer_reviews.author: T. Velykis

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly what’s in the description and more...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this soap twice already and it is absolutely amazing... I will continue to purchase this soap on a regular basis... It is all that it says it is and will do plus some and the price is reasonable... The only downside of it is it doesn’t come in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Meek2017

customer_reviews.title: Faint scent, low lather. Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed that this soap didn’t live up to its aromatherapy promise. Even pressing my nose against the soap I could barely smell it. I wonder if I got a bar that was old or improperly stored. Not sure if it is supposed to lather up well, but the bar I got was also low lather, even wrapped in a sisal washcloth. After 2 showers I tossed it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Nash

customer_reviews.title: great peppermint smell
customer_reviews.text: Been enjoying using these organic products that are reasonable and work very well, great peppermint smell, lasts longer than expected, very happy with it...
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Bialick

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Go Back to Typical Soaps After This
customer_reviews.text: I have an overall more natural feeling of clean after using this soap that I don't get from the typical commercial brands of soap. On top of the feeling of freshness, they also leave you smelling pretty pleasant afterwards. This one and blood orange are my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Herman R Quiroga II

customer_reviews.title: I like mint smelling soap
customer_reviews.text: I like mint smelling soap. I use Duke Cannon normally. I bought this to see how it compared. It's great. Not a 'apples to apples' comparison, but definitely try this. Better price than you could get retail.
customer_reviews.author: FJSIII

customer_reviews.title: Bad - No 'Intense Mint' smell.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 'Intense Mint' soap and it did not smell of peppermint at ALL. Rather it smelled like a stinky, forest or farm animal. I had to wash it off with another peppermint soap that I own and then immediately threw this one in the trash. I cant believe how it stinks! It's pretty hard to get peppermint/tea tree wrong since both have strong smells but this soap had NEITHER (while I hoped for an "intense" smell of mint as the title states. Upset at the waste of $10!
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great soap. The power clean soap line is the best soap I've ever used. I don't care if it's more pricey than the store brands. I feel good about putting it on my skin and I don't get that tight feeling on my skin from the soap drying it out. Highly recommend this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: The smell just wasn't pleasant. The bar starts to go way too quick. No exfoliating at all.
customer_reviews.author: gorilla

customer_reviews.title: Great soap and scent.
customer_reviews.text: Great scent and a nice bit of tingle from the tea tree oil. The price could be a sticking point for some but, in my experience, it at least lasts a while so I feel like I'm getting my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Makes me want to eat some chocolate when showering with this soap.
customer_reviews.text: Sweat has no chance of stinking up your body with this soap....love to run, jump and get my heart rate up and showering after working out feels awesome with this soap. The cool peppermint is very refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Davirgi

customer_reviews.title: perfect for morning PT(military)
customer_reviews.text: amazing scent, works great. on negative is how it goes so fast): lol i wish the company would sell 2 packs of this stuff. highly recommend. especially for morning PT in the military! y'all military know what i mean.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rene

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Scent is mild at best...If you are looking for a cooling soap look elsewhere. IMO Dr. Bronners is a better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Love this soap. Great smell, not too minty. Cooling sensation on my skin. Washes away clean with no residue, leaves skin feeling soft and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great soap just a little high in price
customer_reviews.text: It is a great smelling soap the leaves my skin feeling clean happy with it a little on the pricey side
customer_reviews.author: kenneth mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This soap is sudsy and smells great. Must buy more!
customer_reviews.author: KaleenL

customer_reviews.title: But I like the ingredients and it smells wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really last that long. Maybe a month. But I like the ingredients and it smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Organic soap bar
customer_reviews.text: Tried a single bar and the whole family wants to covert. Fragrant and excellent exfoliant. I need a case! A tiny bit pricy but in my view well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaves you clean.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a couple of organic soaps. Not gonna mention names but this one was definitely one of the better ones . Only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because the "coffee" scent is not that prevalent . I'm sure if I got a different one it would probably be stronger smelling. Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is great soap. Lots of lather and smells good too.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Thomas II

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this company and the customer service! The coffee bar is exfoliating and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: This soap is amazing! The scent is divine and my skin feels ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! The scent is divine and my skin feels wonderful. I will buy it again. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: mslisa

customer_reviews.title: Mint Soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap was fine but not as intense as it's title, but does the job. It could be more mint.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Multiple frangrance choices. Super friendly and knowledgeable staff.
customer_reviews.author: Cara B. Sedberry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was good while it lasted, and that was less than a month. Not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, but Intense Mint is never in stock
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. The only thing I wish is that they could keep Intense Mint in stock. It's hard to find good soap now a days and this brand has the best for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Ryan Pearce

customer_reviews.title: This is the best soap! I love that it is organic and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best soap! I love that it is organic and natural, yet it still gets you super clean. It has just enough tingle to it and smells delicious! Makes a great gift for CrossFitters, but outside of that, it's just great soap. I highly recommend it and will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Melonee

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but $10 for a bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: It's good, but $10 for a bar of soap, like a regular small one. Eh it's alright might buy again if I have money to just throw around...
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. Great texture and the smell is terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This soap is fantastic, after a long day showering with this soap feel fresh again
customer_reviews.author: Mar1123

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Great soap for women as well as men. I use it on my 2.5 year old daughter
customer_reviews.author: Singh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 1 of my 3 favorites. Lavender, coffee, and this in no particular order.
customer_reviews.author: Woodman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing end to my workout! I will try the other soaps when this one runs out.
customer_reviews.author: K.DT

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Lathers well, smells great and doesn't leave a soapy film! Leaves skin feeling clean and refreshed, even after the hardest and sweatiest of workouts. Can't wait to try the other scents!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This soap is amazing! It removes odor
customer_reviews.text: My main concern about organic soap is that a lot of organic products do not remove odor. This soap is amazing! It removes odor, smells great, and leaves me feeling clean and refreshed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soap!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome soap!! Smells great. Makes your skin feel very clean however it doesn't last long at all. It is a large bar of soap but only lasts about a week with once a day use.
customer_reviews.author: awesome

customer_reviews.title: Soap is clean smelling and fresh,
customer_reviews.text: Soap is clean smelling and fresh, but you have to remember with these types of bars that they do not last very long which is sort of disappointing at $8-$10/bar
customer_reviews.author: William Sieg

customer_reviews.title: Give it a try!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. It makes my skin feel clean but not dried out. I like the scratchy stuff in it too. Makes a good rich lather and seems to last a long time as well. The peppermint is cooling but not too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Description of the smell.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the price, but wasn’t really a fan of the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Zendejas

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap!! My kids even love using it!! The little rough pieces exfoliate and the smell is so refreshing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ozment

customer_reviews.title: Good soap yet not worth $10
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice soap. Love the peppermint essential oil. Not necessarily worth ten bucks though in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Soto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it! need to order an other one...does not last long!! Favorite morning shower soap bar!
customer_reviews.author: nicole buholzer berthoud

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome! I will be ordering this again for sure
customer_reviews.text: Been using the Power Clean Soap for about a week now. It's awesome! I will be ordering this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Perez

customer_reviews.title: This should be at least 8oz for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for 4oz. It should be at least 8oz for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This soap lathers up wonderfully! Leaving a clean, fresh scent. I will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. You will not be disappointed with the scent and feel of the soap bar.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: Nice minty odor
customer_reviews.text: Nice odor (minty). Has bits of black something in it - tea tree leaves? Leaves a nice smell on the skin. Didn't last too long. I won't order again. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yanal

customer_reviews.title: stop reading reviews and buy it
customer_reviews.text: This soap has that tingly fresh feeling that leaves me wanting to get dirty again just to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lolomadams

customer_reviews.title: This soap is amazing! Absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: This soap is amazing! Absolutely love it. I can smell the sent on my skin all day long. Obsessed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excited to shower.
customer_reviews.text: I could smell this soap from outside the shipping box..no joke. It's amazing! So refreshing and up lifting. We love this so much we have placed a second order to send to our soldier who is deployed over seas for Christmas, though he is very busy defending our freedom he also has some time to power lift. We are excited for him to receive his peppermint recovery bar.
customer_reviews.author: cari

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as intense or invigorating as we had hoped it would be. It's disintegrating very quickly even though it is left to drain and dry after each use...pretty disappointing considering the price tag. I would buy it again as it is pleasant, but only if the price was half of what I paid. Lesson learned, I will revert to peppermint castile...
customer_reviews.author: SoccerMom

customer_reviews.title: I just want to say that I love this soap
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say that I love this soap. I do yoga in a 100 degree room, then shower with the peppermint soap. I found after a 90 minute workout I usually go home and sleep. After a friend told me to get peppermint soap, I find it refreshing and now I can leave yoga and get chores done too. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Not my fav
customer_reviews.text: This wasn't my favorite, but she loved it so I'm giving it 3 stars. It smells really good but for me it was sticky and melted onto the shelf, so I think it's great that it's organic, has essential oils but for sure for girls I think.
customer_reviews.author: zachus

customer_reviews.title: Great soap, but it does not last.
customer_reviews.text: Great soap. Builds an excellent lather and I really feel clean when using it. The problem? It goes extremely quick. For the price, it is tough to keep buying knowing it will not last very long.
customer_reviews.author: K Ray

customer_reviews.title: Best bar of soap that I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I know a lot of people complain about it being one bar and how it doesn't last long but I ordered this bar of soap back in January and it's April now (and I shower daily) and I'll be reordering soon. So I don't know if your constantly running the soap underneath the water or if your not scrubbing with a loofah (which I find helps move around the soap) so if you don't own a loofah or a soap dish I recommend picking that up with the soap. Give that a try if your constantly running through your soap.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Jesse Alva

customer_reviews.title: This equals a clean boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves it and it gets him super squeaky clean. It helps to get rid of his b.o. too!
customer_reviews.author: HamburgerHelper

customer_reviews.title: Soap
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Not worth 10 dollars. I will update my review after trying the 3 dollar bar I also bought.
customer_reviews.author: NYCDapp

customer_reviews.title: It is a very good soap for body wash
customer_reviews.text: It is a very good soap for body wash, love the light fragrance and all natural ingredients. It’s pricy for a four ounce soap.
customer_reviews.author: Joe W Harris

customer_reviews.title: This soap smells amazing! My kids have discovered it and now they ...
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells amazing! My kids have discovered it and now they like to use it too. We're all naturally and powerfully clean now!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla McD

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this soap. Everything from the smell, the fact its all natural, to the way it makes my skin feel.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Too Rough.. Sandpaper
customer_reviews.text: Soap was rough like sandpaper, so much so that I had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: True Review

customer_reviews.title: Great service from the seller
customer_reviews.text: Great service from the seller, and the soap smelled amazing! Nice and minty. I also liked the texture- it felt pleasant and also exfoliated at the same time. One thing to note...this really does have peppermint oil, and it can sting more sensitive areas, which I found out the hard way!
customer_reviews.author: Bunsworth

customer_reviews.title: Great soap!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. It leaves your skin feeling fresh, clean, and cool. The tea tree oil has an awesome cooling sensation. It also acts as aroma therapy. I have very sensitive skin and I tried so many different brands of soap and none compare to this soap. I highly recommend this soap to anyone with or without skin issues. I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Patterson

customer_reviews.title: No orange smell. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a soap that smells like delicious orange keep shopping. This gets you clean but to claim it as aromatherapy is a serious stretch! UPDATE 3-23-17 - I didn't request it but the company gave a full refund on the soap. Even though I wasn't a fan of the soap excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.author: J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Repeat Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first bar a while ago. It can be hard to find on Amazon, but finally I found it again and got more. Hope to continue using this. It's good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: William Eck

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: This soap really lathers great, rinses clean and smells great. I would have given it 5 stars if it were priced a little more reasonably. $9.97 for 4 oz. is a bit expensive. The product itself is outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Neff

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but cleans well - especially after gym. If it were half the price, I'd give it 10 stars.
customer_reviews.text: It is pricey - that much is clear....but I love this soap. I go through 3 of these a month, so it gets to be a bit expensive, though. However, I'd rather pay for it the way it is than for them to substitute lesser ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tait

customer_reviews.title: BAD skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried all the other scents but this one left me with a terrible skin irritation that made me want to scratch my skin off, and I dont have sensitive skin either. Other soaps work wonders but avoid this one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bates

customer_reviews.title: Very refreshing and invigorating soap with a strong mint scent ...
customer_reviews.text: Very refreshing and invigorating soap with a strong mint scent. This soap contains a mild abrasive which really leaves your skin feeling fresh and new.
customer_reviews.author: Chiriqui 1991

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great menthol for a bar soap. Good scrubbing action. I shaved down the sharp corners and edges.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love this soap
customer_reviews.text: Powerfully clean! Has a great smell, cleans well, nice suds, everything you need
customer_reviews.author: Kevlem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like the smell and how it makes my skin feel
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: great soap - smells good
customer_reviews.text: great soap - smells good, and cleans well with no residue. My only complaint is that it does not last - expect 10 washes before the bar is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lavender
customer_reviews.text: Makes plenty of suds and smells great. Leaves your skin feeling clean and refreshed, not dry and itchy like some soaps.
customer_reviews.author: Eric S.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd bar of Power Clean Soap. I've tried the Cool Peppermint and Lemongrass and couldn't be happier with the product. The intense mint is my favorite so far.
customer_reviews.author: themattg22

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: We love every soap we’ve tried from this company. Just be sure to keep it somewhere dry in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: edehart

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an Awsome soap smells great a little much for the price but it's good soap
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Very good soap but did not last that long but do ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good soap but did not last that long but do love the smell when it hits the water and you definitely feel and smell the mint when it hits the body👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Hutcherson

customer_reviews.title: Quality $oap
customer_reviews.text: Pros: cleans well, smells nice, and is made from good quality ingredients. Cons: high price; only lasts about 10 showers.
customer_reviews.author: C/O Jim

customer_reviews.title: Really great product. Im glad i found this soap
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. Im glad i found this soap. Has a nice subtle minty scent. Leaves my skin feeling clean and refreshed! Plus i get alot of compliments from the ladies on how good i smell! Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Robert Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love the smell and leaves me feeling refreshed
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the smell and leaves me feeling refreshed, just wish it had some grit to it to scrub a little more. But other wise can't complain one bit!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary David

customer_reviews.title: The soap smells great and works great
customer_reviews.text: The soap smells great and works great, so for that I would give it 5 stars. I dropped it to 3 stars because it lasted about 10 showers. That's a bit pricey for $10 a bar.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Lethander

customer_reviews.title: Smells great without it being overpowering
customer_reviews.text: Standard size soap. For some reason I thought it would be larger. But I can't complain about the quality. Smells great without it being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Alex V

customer_reviews.title: New favorite soap.
customer_reviews.text: After working out, I always feel gross and stinky. Even after showering and scrubbing with a loofa, I still never felt like my workout smell would be 100% gone. I have been using this soap for a week now, and not only do I feel like my workout smell is completely gone, but I feel refreshed from the minty feel of the soap. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap. I would give it five stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soap. I would give it five stars, but it is so overpriced. $10 for a bar of soap that lasts about two weeks?! Only if you're rich. I found a similar soap on Thrive and got three for the price of one of these.
customer_reviews.author: C. Humble

customer_reviews.title: Very small bar; does not last
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed when I received the bar - $10 for a bar of soap smaller than a standard bar?! - and further disappointed when it only lasted 10 days. Sorry, I'm not going to spend $30/month on soap! I followed their instructions on placing the bar on a wire rack out of constant contact with water and it still didn't last. Severely overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Good soap but.... Too expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like this soap alot, but I have a problem with the price tho, I am currently searching for another cheaper brand that does the same thing. I'm going to check out Dr. Bronner's products, much cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. ShSa

customer_reviews.title: Experience it
customer_reviews.text: Read the title. It speaks for itself. The best decision you can make is to experience for yourself. For the price you won't go broke. Your body will thank you later.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Nice but way overpriced for short longevity.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice but super expensive and does NOT last long at all. I would pay $7.00 for this as compared to others in the class. I wont buy again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Lawless

customer_reviews.title: POWER Cool Smell.....
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, to include packaging, just slightly overpriced for the size 4oz's
customer_reviews.author: unknownsoldier....

customer_reviews.title: and really wasn't that great.
customer_reviews.text: Way overpriced, melted away very quickly, and really wasn't that great.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

product_meta.title: Organic Bar Soap for Athletes with Soothing Lavender Essential Oil | Relaxing Aromatherapy for All Skin Types (Including Sensitive) | 100% All Natural, Non GMO, SLS &.
product_meta.description: Color:Soothing LavenderAfter a tough workout, Certified Organic Power Clean Soothing Lavender Soap will relax you with calming lavender oil and moisturizing glycerin while reducing stress and soothing sore muscles 100% naturally. Thanks to our innovative aromatherapy soap, you can achieve a deep, refreshing clean without the use of harsh chemical sports soaps. Each bar delivers relaxing scents of lavender and lavandin, alkanet root, comfrey root and rosemary that relaxes away your stress and soothes your skin to promote healthy blood flow and speed up muscle repair after a brutal trip to the gym. All-natural organic ingredients nourish your body without leaving harmful residues or harsh chemical agents, making this bar perfect for all skin typesãsensitive or otherwise. Healthy Body, Healthy You Whether youêre a team player, Cross Fit champion, or weekend jogger, you know that taking care of your body is the best way to ensure top performance. The herbal post-workout Power Clean soap is the perfect way to end your night or start the day. « All-natural, organic, non-GMO ingredients « Moisturizing glycerin wonêt dry skin like most other deep-cleansing soaps « Free of parabens, sodium laurel sulfates, and chemical agents « Scented with plant-extracted essential oils (no synthetic fragrances or coloring!) « Coconut, palm, and safflower oils nourish skin for lasting softness « Prevents bacterial and viral infection, jock itch, eczema, gym rash, and more « Safe for use on sensitive skin For quality last-minute gifts and stocking stuffers, our athleteês soap comes in a craft paper box so you can share the secret of Power Clean with coaches, workout pals, and family members. Treat yourself to organic luxury with our Power Clean post-workout soap, or give this therapeutic soap bar to the devoted athlete in your life.
feature_bullets: THE ULTIMATE SOAP FOR ATHLETES: The intoxicating fragrance, our soap's pure, organic Lavender Essential Oil provides a relaxing aromatherapy session to relieve you from feelings of stress, depression, anxiety, and even headaches. The soap will banish tough post-workout odors with a refreshing scent while providing nutrients to your skin and body that are calming and relaxing.

UNIQUELY SOOTHING: Aromatic lavender delivers a pleasant relaxing sensation. Lavender will aid with muscle repair and is an excellent remedy for various types of pains including those caused by sore and tense muscles. After a long, taxing workout, treat yourself to the finest form of relaxation. A warm bath paired with our Lavender Soap will melt away your stress and sore muscles while nourishing your skin. You'll feel refreshed and ready for a calming night’s sleep!
LONG-LASTING MOISTURE: Unlike ordinary sports soap, our bar lasts 3x longer + contains 10% glycerin (a superior humectant and moisturizer) to protect your skin instead of stripping its natural oils.

KEEP YOUR SKIN HEALTHY: Made with organic ingredients, all-natural essential oils, and no synthetic fragrances, chemicals or residue so you can stay one step ahead of the competition. Our soap is 100% pure, vegan, and safe for all skin types including sensitive skin. It contains no parabens, alcohol, petroleum, dyes, fragrances, animal fat, preservatives, or GMOs
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: As part of our commitment to customer satisfaction, you can return your Power Clean soap for a full refund if you aren’t 100% satisfied.
